Translations.Text: A yimdanen! Eezzbet i Mass nnwen, ikwen Ixelqen seg yiwen n lxelq, u Ixelq ed segs ayugan is. Issuffe$ ed, segsen, aias n yirgazen akked tlawin. Eezzbet i Oebbi i$ef tepmesteqsayem, akw i taabbuvin. Oebbi, s tidep, Izga Iquoaa kwen
Efket ayla nnsen i igujilen, ur pparat dduni deg umkan n laali. Ur pparat ayla nnsen d ayla nnwen. Ih, wagi d abekkav ameqwoan
Ma tugadem ur tweznem ara ar igujilen, a$et ayen i wen ihwan n tlawin: snat, kravt, kuet. Ma tugadem ur tessaadalem ara, yiwet kan, ne$ taklatin nnwen. Akka i iwulem, ur ppakwret
Efket tuccit nnsent i tlawin, d tikci. Ma rrant awen d kra segs, s leb$i nnsent, ccet ep, s lfeoe akked llza
Ur ppaket i ije$lufen ayla nnwen, win i wen Ifka Oebbi i tmeddurt. Oeeqet pen segs, sselset pen, eeiedet awal nnwen $uosen

Jeoobet igujilen, alamma bbwven i jjwao. Ma tufam ten eewoen, efket asen ayla nnsen. Ur ten teppet s uveggaa d usexseo, uqbel ad im$uoen. Ameokanti ad ieezzeb, ame$bun ad icc s lekyasa. Mara sen tefkem ayla nnsen, s inagan fellas. Nesteqnaa s Oebbi i leesab
